mapper.insert: insert into m_mbr_sight_sign (id, winery_id, winery_sight_id, mbr_id, sign_date, create_date, modify_date) values (#{id}, #{wineryId}, #{winerySightId}, #{mbrId}, #{signDate}, #{createDate}, #{modifyDate})
mapper.update:
update m_mbr_sight_sign
winery_id = #{wineryId},
winery_sight_id = #{winerySightId},
mbr_id = #{mbrId},
sign_date = #{signDate},
create_date = #{createDate},
modify_date = #{modifyDate},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id from m_mbr_sight_sign where date(create_date) = curdate() and mbr_id = #{id} order by create_date desc
